divs: Sighting DetailsMy 13yr old son and two other students saw a starlike u.f.o. Move through the sky. It happened around 6:30 am. My son took a pic with his cellphone. It moved in the west sky changeing directions slightly before moving out of sight. This is twice these kids have seen something like this lately I have no idea what is going on. My son said he believes ufos are attracted to the moldavite pendant he wears. The first pic is the orinal, the second is the same pic cropped for a close up you can also see trees.
Summary: My 13yr son and 2 other student waiting for the bus got a pic of ufo
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Salina
There were no other sightings in Salina on or around January 13th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
